attributes.action: Knighthood All Four Members of Black Sabbath
attributes.additional_details: They created the genre of Heavy Metal and through their sevices to this and their charity support are most deserving to have knighhoods given in the new year honours for 2025/2026.
attributes.background: To ensure for their services to music and charity that Tony Iommi, Bill Ward, Geezer Buther and John "Ozzy" Osbourne are given a long overdue knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for people to be given an honour.

The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
